altTitles.ja-ro: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party!☆PICO Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: BanG Dream! ガルパ☆ピコ コミックアンソロジー

description.en:
The fun, lively days of the Chibi Garupa cast, brought to you by a wonderful group of creators!  
  
---
**Volume 1**
Cover: [Miyajima Seiya](https://mangadex.org/author/3133bac4-f771-436a-8bde-1d790b6d1b1c)
Illustration: [Kosugi Koutarou](https://mangadex.org/author/cbef1659-c4f3-480a-ae1c-b14fe8683af0)

**Chapters**:
1. **Star Beat** by Miyajima Seiya
2. **Warehouse Practice** by Fujishima Shinnosuke
3. **Chocolate Cornets Are Terrifying** by Kazawa Youhei
4. **Let's Try Doing a Cosplay Live!** by Mattaku Moosuke
5. **Don't think! Eat.** by PAPA
6. **Rock n' Bread Roll** by Tsuchii
7. **Bread, Band and Afterglow** by Abe Kanari
8. **Aya Will Throw This Round Ball!!** by Zunda Croquette
9. **In the Middle of the Dream+ (plus)** by Kosugi Koutarou
10. **PasuPare of The Dead** by Shiba Yuusuke
11. **PICO Party!** by Ishida Aya
12. **Cats and Roses Day After Day** by Dr. Pepperco
13. **Roselia's Messy Day** by Kazahana Chiruwo
14. **An Eternity of Reasons** by Kongari Pasta
15. **Kokoro's Community Field Trip** by Nishi Asuka
16. **Hello, Happy World! VS Bear** by Zunda Croquette
17. **HaroHapi Showtime Go!** by Take Shinobu
18. **PICO Party! ...Returns?** by Ishida Aya
19. **Let's Work Your Body** by Tanukichi
---
**Volume 2**
Cover & Illustration: [Kongari Pasta](https://mangadex.org/author/49d3e393-726c-4a9c-a237-853e994b8f95)

**Chapters**:
1. by Kongari Pasta
2. by Tsuchii
3. **Popipa MEETING** by Fujishima Shinnosuke
4. **Hang in There! Afterglow** by Higashi 385
5. **Before Afterglow 1841** by PAPA
6. **Helper's Rhapsody** by Ginmoku
7. by Kosugi Koutarou
8. **Ego-surfing Girl Aya-chan** by Kazahana Chiruwo
9. by Kamoto Tatsuya
10. by Shiba Yuusuke
11. **Rising STOIC Power** by Mori Misaki
12. **What's the secret to happiness?** by Tanukichi
13. **Nekoshoku Starmine** by Zunda Croquette
14. **Hello Happy Sea World!** by Takamura Masaya
15. **Hello! Happy VR World!** by errant
16. by Oimoto Jirou
17. by Tanukichi
---
**Volume 3**
Cover: [Miyajima Seiya](https://mangadex.org/author/3133bac4-f771-436a-8bde-1d790b6d1b1c)
Illustration: [Akagashi](https://mangadex.org/author/ea614d7a-651d-4a21-bb72-4a8e5e5d5def)

**Chapters**:
1. by Miyajima Seiya
2. by Ootsuki
3. by Fujishima Shinnosuke
4. by Shirano Akihiro
5. by Kaga Mitsuki
6. by KAERUDX
7. by Kazahana Chiruwo
8. by Ootsuki
9. by Akagashi
10. by Tatsuhiko
11. by Oomiya Miyami
12. by Den2bow
13. by Inukai Rippo (Ripo Day)
14. by Peke
15. by Himitsu
16. by Amane Kashiko
17. by mizumi
